description: This file defines the main App component for a React-based web application. It manages theme toggling, constructs a carousel with slides, and handles image assets dynamically and gracefully. It also includes utility hooks for user preferences.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the application's header, theme toggle, and carousel.

methods.name: tryResolveImage
methods.description: Attempts to dynamically require an asset; returns undefined if the asset isn't found.

methods.name: usePrefersReducedMotion
methods.description: Custom hook to detect user's reduced motion preference for accessibility.
